subject: Baseball
All Star Games
World Series
lead_paragraph: The A.L. has won five straight All-Star Games since players and owners approved the plan. And A.L. teams have gone 8-2 in Games 1 and 2 of the Series.
snippet: The A.L. has won five straight All-Star Games since players and owners approved the plan. And A.L. teams have gone 8-2 in Games 1 and 2 of the Series.
